version.author: ERSH, Yury Ershov

version.author: ERSH, Yury Ershov

version.author: ERSH, Yury Ershov
version.changelog: v1.0: * Initial release v1.1.0: * Add Predictive Peak Limiter for non-peak driven modes v1.2.0: * (internal) Use separate files for libraries v1.2.1: * Add presets v1.2.2: * Correct initial gain value v1.2.4: * Correct "long" modes (RMS, LUFS) lookahead. v1.2.5: * Add "Reset" button v1.3.0: * Improvements to peak limiter * Added a "Limiter" preset v1.3.3: * Fixed pdc_delay: set pdc_bot_ch and pdc_top_ch.

version.author: ersh, Yury Ershov
version.changelog: v1.0: * Initial release v2.0: * Add Phase correction for HP mode. * Add Wet/Dry balance. * Original waveform: https://i.imgur.com/35YRvDD.png Improved waveform: https://i.imgur.com/6025IWy.png

version.author: ersh, Yury Ershov
version.changelog: v1.0: * Initial release v2.0: * Add Phase correction for HP mode. * Add Wet/Dry balance. * Original waveform: https://i.imgur.com/35YRvDD.png Improved waveform: https://i.imgur.com/6025IWy.png v2.0: * Fixed pdc_delay: set pdc_bot_ch and pdc_top_ch.

version.author: ERSH, Yury Ershov
version.changelog: v1.0: * Initial release

version.author: ersh
version.changelog: v2.0: * Initial release v2.1: * Add gain smoothness parameter. * Increased internal frame rate to 1500 for finer peak resolution. * Performance optimization.
